column4: man my computer is the heater in my room but not when I run ubuntu cause it manages the CPU efficiently and therefore less load and heat
maybe I should run Windows Vista temporarily to heat up the room ..lolz
anyone else run ubuntu in a cold climate ??
yeah something useful DanielRM not Windows Vista .. lol
this past winter when it got cold, I ran ubuntu on an old amd...old amds make great space heaters
